column4: Why is it that when I log out of a vt, it doesn't go back to a login prompt? How can I make the 4 that are blank screens go back to one?
you want the screen to be cleared when you log out?
it's cleared, but I don't get a login prompt... it just stays blank
what I'm asking is how do I get my login prompts back :)
They should return back each time ... not sure why they won't at your system
it should be controlled by /etc/event.d/tty*, or /etc/inittab if you have one. Have you edited any of those?
it runs getty at the end... dunno what's going on :/
that's identical to mine, so I don't see anything wrong :/
maybe have a look at /var/log/syslog, and see if there are any related error messages
hmm... only cron, postfix and dhcp running, from what I can see once I grep them out.
try starting getty manually (not sure if it works though): "sudo /sbin/getty 38400 tty1"
